name: Mulberry
description:
A short and very unfinished game entry to My First Game Jam Winter 2023. Finished game will feature more playable squirrels, map interaction, and a rising flood you must escape from!

This started as a project to learn about working with tilemaps in Godot for the "My First Game Jam Winter 2023". I learned a lot, and will be learning more as I improve it.

Art by:

The Flavare : https://theflavare.itch.io/

MikAnimus : https://mikanimus.itch.io/

Elthen : https://elthen.itch.io/

Yar : https://opengameart.org/users/yar

Me
